name: Doodlebug Island
description:
Doodlebug Island is a social game where you hunt bugs and take photos. Explore the island and find all 20 for an amazing prize!

Post your best shots to Doodlebug, a social network that lets you see other players' photos in real time! Browse other photographers' posts to find that pesky bug that's been eluding you! "Heart" other photos to give someone else a warm fuzzy feeling!

[BUG] New posts in Doodlebug (including your own) are appearing at the bottom of the feed, rather than the top as intended -- so you'll have to scroll down to see them! Sorry!

Controls
  • [WASD] (or arrow keys) to move
  • [SPACE] to snap a photo or interact with the overworld
  • [Mouse] to navigate menus
    • Mouse wheel, click-and-drag, or WASD to scroll through Doodlebug
  • (If you want: [ESCAPE] to close menus)

(Note: This game is best experienced with online connectivity.)

If you'd like to reset the game, hold R for 5 seconds, then close and re-open the game. (sorry it's kinda jank, we put it in very last-minute)

Credits
  • by Nathan, Diana, and Anderson
  • Font is Pangolin
  • Some tiles by Cainos
  • Freesounds for a few effects: camera focus, camera snap, walking
